entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 07:00 AM CDT Thursday 05 May 2016
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this morning. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:42 AM CDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of freezing rain or ice pellets before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:42 AM CDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain or ice pellets changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:42 AM CDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
